name: Infinite Universe
description:
Open full screen to because it looks strange without it.

edit. nevermind I think I fixed it.

It's my first project I ever uploaded and I must have  make some mistakes with resolution. 

Story:

YOU ARE CREW OF AMBITIOUS PEOPLE THAT MANAGED TO STEAL ONE OF EXPERIMENTAL SPACECRAFT ABLE TO TRAVEL WITH SPEED GREATER THAN SPEED OF LIGHT. TO TRAVEL AROUND THE UNIVERSE. BUT YOU DIDN'T REALISE SPACE IS BIGGER THAT YOU COULD IMAGINE. AND THERE ARE MANY PEOPLE THAT MIGHT WANNA CHASE YOU DOWN.

Infinite Runner space shooter.

Instructions in the game. Game was made for 72h ZenoJam3. 

Goodluck andpost your highscores.

premade assets used:
